General.Name: Sievi Capital Plc
General.Description: KH Group Oyj, a conglomerate, operates in B2B products and services and consumer trade sectors. It operates through KH-Koneet, Indoor Group, Nordic Rescue Group, and HTJ segments. The KH-Koneet segment sells and rents a range of machinery, equipment, and services for needs related to earthworks, property maintenance, and material handling. This segment is involved in the sale of machinery and spare parts, the sale of maintenance and repair services, and the rental of machinery. The Indoor Group segment is involved in the retail operations for furniture and interior decoration products, as well as sells through online stores. The Nordic Rescue Group segment manufactures and distributes rescue vehicles in the Nordic countries. The segment's operations consist of the sale of rescue vehicles and related maintenance and repair services. The HTJ segment provides its customers with a range of services in construction management, site supervision, energy and environmental consulting, and project management. KH Group Oyj was founded in 2012 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.
